original: Melchior, Gösta Jakob Emanuel, stadsingenjör, Värnamo, f. 28/5/06 i Östra Tollstad, östergötl. h, av Albin M. o. Maria Berggren. G. 35 m. Stina Bergström. Barn: Sven-Gunnar f. 37, Sten A^iders 41, Lars-Olof 43, Ragna 44. — Stud:ex. i Södertälje 25, civil-ing :ex. v. CTH (VoV) 31, mätn :mannakurs 34. Bitr. ing. o. arb rchef v. gatu- o. vägförvaltn. i Gbg 30-35, handh. utredn. ang. stadsplaner o. snabbtrafikbanor v. stadsplanekont. där 36, där. i byggn:teknik v. priv. tekn. sk. 36, stadsing. o. byggn:chef samt sekr. h. byggn :ndn i Värnamo sed. 37. Stud:res’a t. Engl. 39.
translated: Melchior, Gösta Jakob Emanuel, municipal engineer, Värnamo, b. 28/5/06 in Östra Tollstad, Östergötland county, son of Albin M. and Maria Berggren. Married in 1935 to Stina Bergström. Children: Sven-Gunnar b. 1937, Sten Anders b. 1941, Lars-Olof b. 1943, Ragna b. 1944. Completed high school in Södertälje in 1925, obtained a civil engineering degree from the Chalmers University of Technology (VoV) in 1931, and a surveying course in 1934. Assistant engineer and work manager at the road and highway administration in Gothenburg from 1930-1935, involved in investigations regarding city plans and rapid transit routes at the city planning office there in 1936, and in building technology at a private technical school in 1936. Municipal engineer and building chief, as well as secretary of the building board in Värnamo since 1937. Undertook a study trip to England in 1939.
